import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import "./styles.css"; const OrderReview = () => { const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [addr, setAddr] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { const address = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("Address")) setName(address.firstName + " "+ address.lastName) setAddr(address.address) console.log("add", address); }, []); return (

) } export default OrderReview
